How to Build Effective AI Agents: Lessons from Anthropic

A Practical Guide to Creating Smart, Reliable AI Systems: From Workflows to Dynamic Problem Solving

Kenji

Recently, Anthropic, one of the leading AI research companies, published a fascinating paper that dives into what makes an effective AI agent. As someone working with AI systems daily, I was struck by how practical and immediately applicable their insights are.

This isn't just academic theoryâ€”it's a roadmap for building AI systems that actually work.
